column4: I have a fit-PC that came with Ubuntu preloaded. It does not have any virtual consoles enabled - only F7 (where X11 lives) - is that normal for Ubuntu?
_dbd_l12 Do you know what it is that might need to be reconfigured to get the other virtual console renabled
honestly, if you just got the laptop I would contact the manufacturer to see if they altered something to get that behavior
